example.description: Adds a VPC Internet Gateway to a VPC in the current default region.

example.code: PS C:\>$VPC = New-EC2Vpc -CidrBlock 10.0.0.0/24 PS C:\>New-EC2InternetGateway | Add-EC2InternetGateway -VpcId $VPC.VpcId
example.description: Creates a VPC and Internet Gateway, and attaches the Gateway to the VPC in the current default region.
